description.hltext_display: WAF防护核心WEB应用
description.content:
WEB应用的重要性
随着互联网技术的发展，WEB应用越来越受到业务系统的重视，WEB应用已经与我们的核心业务系统密不可分。如今的电子政务、电子商务、网上银业、网上营业厅等均以WEB为载体。WEB也由原来的网站浏览的代名词转变为诸如网上报名、网上交易、网上报税等多种业务应用系统。
WAF的价值
WEB价值重点体现在门户网站的时代时，我们所面临的安全威胁主要源自网站被黑或者网站被篡改，因此网页防篡改技术得到成长并大量使用。应用推运系统架构革新，而系统架构的和革新推动安全技术的发展。WEB应用防火墙也不例外，也是在现有WEB防护技术力日益无法满足业务的新需求时诞生的。
如果说防篡改软件是一种基于文件管理的被动办法，那么WAF则是从安全的本质出发，对威胁进行主动防御，并对WEB应用进行性能优化的最佳方案。简单将防篡改软件理解为是文件恢复管理，而WAF则是分析处理不安全的访问行为，这些不安全的行为包括网页篡改事件、信息泄漏事件、信息窃取事件、信息失效事件等。在中国WEB应用环境下的WAF通常也会具有网页防篡改的客户端，功能和市面的网页防篡改软件几乎相同。
WAF以独立的硬件网关存在，其部署和使用过程中不需要对原有的WEB服务器作任何的调整，并且WAF本身支持多种部署方式，例如透明网桥模式的部署不需对网络进行任何调整。
与IPS相比WEB应用防火墙可谓是专注于WEB应用的IPS，与传统的IPS不同，WEB应用防火墙在特征匹配方面的粒度更细，至少可以精确到如下几个节点：
对协议的全面理解以及协议规范性检查
请求头关键字段的识别和特征匹配，从而降低误判
响应头敏感信息的处理防止服务器指纹泄露
响应体特征匹配，屏蔽敏感信息泄露
针对单个请求，基于单个URL的匹配最大程度确认业务系统的可用性
WAF的优越性
WEB应用防火墙技术架构上最佳方案是采用代理技术实现，然而标准的代理技术应用到WEB应用防火墙时却存在一个先天的不足。代理技术会中断业务请求，因此部署WEB应用防火墙需要调整现有业务架构或网络数据走向。另一方面代理技术存在性能瓶颈，难在胜任大型的业务系统。
安恒信息采用内核级代理技术解决了部署全透明和性能两个技术瓶颈，是国内首创的全透明WEB应用防火墙，并成功应用于诸多网上银行、运营商BOSS系统、电子政务等核心业务系统。
WEB应用防火墙采用基于特征库的防御技术进行防护，而特征库技术只能解决通用的，已知的攻击行为。而WEB应用系统千差万别，仅采用通用特征库不仅防护效果不佳，而且可能会因为代码的原因导致误判，从而影响业务系统的可用性。因此安恒WEB应用防火墙中加入了异常检测引擎用于提高防护能力，降低误判率。异常检测技术可以用一个下面这个例子进行说明：
安全检测好比闭路电视监控系统，基于特征的检测技术即通过行人的身高、体重、外貌进行检测，然后通过X光机检测身上是否带了已知的不安全装备。而异常检测则是通过对人的行为特征进行分析，例如一个人进门时身带了一个手拧包，而走到大厅后将手拧包放下，人离开。针对这种特为将为触发报警动作。
异常检测到WEB安全检测中主要用于补偿特征库的短板，可以有效的防御未知攻击、盗链行为、应用DDOS攻击等。

description.hltext_display: Laos pondrá en marcha su bolsa con dos empresas públicas el 11 de enero
description.content:
Bangkok, 22 dic (EFE).- Laos, país comunista que se encuentra entre los más pobres de Asia, pondrá en marcha su primer mercado de valores el próximo 11 de enero en el que, para comenzar, cotizarán dos empresas públicas, informa hoy la prensa local.
EDL-Generation of Laos, cuyo único negocio es la venta de electricidad al monopolio público Electricite du Laos, del cual es filial, ofrece desde hace una semana 217 millones de acciones a inversores locales e internacionales a 4,300 kip (0,54 dólares) por acción.
De estas, 10,8 millones se reservan a los empleados de la empresa que podrán adquirirlas a 4,000 kip la acción.
La otra empresa que cotizará en la bolsa laosiana es el Bank pour le Commerce Exterieur Lao (BECL) que pondrá a la venta a partir de mañana 20 millones de acciones a un precio inicial de 5,000 kip (0,63 dólares).
La comisión Laos Securities Exchange exige que ambas empresas hayan vendido el 80 por ciento de estas acciones antes de empezar con las negociaciones en el parqué, según explica el periódico Vientiane Times. EFE

description.hltext_display: 外館製發護照不適用赴加免簽(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者劉坤原華盛頓2010年12月21日專電）中華民國駐美代表處今天發佈新聞指出，加拿大給予中華民國國民免簽證待遇，僅適用於外交部在台北核發且載有身分證字號的普通護照，駐外各館處製發的護照不適用。代表處說，最近有很多僑胞詢問，持外館製發的護照，可否免簽進入加拿大。據加拿大移民部及加拿大駐台北貿易辦事處說明，目前加國給予中華民國國民免簽待遇，僅適用於中華民國外交部在台北核發，且載有身分證字號的中華民國普通護照。

description.hltext_display: 최우수디자인상 수상한 중앙대 도..
description.content:
두산건설이 시공한 서울 흑석동 중앙대학교 중앙도서관이 지식경제부가 주최하고 한국디자인진흥원이 주관한 ‘2010년 우수디자인(GD)상’ 최우수상을 수상했다고 회사 측이 22일 밝혔다. 이 회사는 또 경기 일산위브더제니스 견본주택 등 10건이 우수상에 선정됐다고 설명했다. 중앙대학교 중앙도서관 야경.

description.hltext_display: Badajoz está en alerta amarilla por tormentas y precipitaciones
description.content:
Mérida/Madrid, 22 dic (EFE).- Badajoz y Ceuta se encuentran en alerta amarilla por tormentas y precipitaciones de 40 litros por metro cuadrado en doce horas, por rachas máximas de viento de 70 kilómetros por hora, ha informado la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (Aemet).
Cádiz, Granada, Málaga, A Coruña y Asturias están en alerta naranja (riesgo importante) por lluvias, nieve y fenómenos adversos costeros.
En las provincias andaluzas de Cádiz, Granada y Málaga las precipitaciones pueden alcanzar los 80 litros por metro cuadrado en doce horas; A Coruña se encuentra en alerta naranja por vientos costeros, mientras que Asturias lo está por nevadas que pueden alcanzar un espesor de entre 5 y 15 centímetros.
En Córdoba, Huelva y Sevilla se encuentran en alerta amarilla ante el riesgo de tormentas y precipitaciones de 40 litros por metro cuadrado en doce horas y por rachas máximas de viento de 70 kilómetros por hora, mientras que Almería y Jaén lo están solo por lluvias.
Todo Canarias se encuentra en alerta por fenómenos adversos costeros, mientras que por rachas máximas de viento de 75 kilómetros por hora la alerta se circunscribe a El Hierro, Fuerteventura, Lanzarote, La Palma y Tenerife.
La alerta amarilla se extiende, en este caso por nevadas de hasta 15 centímetros de espesor, a Cantabria, León, Zamora, Lugo y Ourense, mientras que en Pontevedra se esperan fenómenos adversos costeros.
Protección Civil recomienda a los ciudadanos que ante la posibilidad de vientos costeros, hay que procurar alejarse de la playa y de otros lugares bajos que puedan ser afectados por las elevadas mareas y oleajes que suelen generarse ante la intensidad de vientos fuertes. Hay que procurar, además, evitar los desplazamientos por carretera y si es necesario hacerlos, extremar las precauciones por la posible presencia de obstáculos en la vía.

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Post Agrees EUR2 Billion Credit Line
description.content:
Deutsche Post AG Adr (USOTC:DPSGY)
Intraday Stock Chart
German postal and logistics giant Deutsche Post AG (DPW.XE) said Wednesday it agreed upon a revolving syndicated credit facility with a consortium of German and international banks for a volume of EUR2 billion.
MAIN FACTS:
-It serves as a replacement for the previous bilateral credit lines and further strengthens the group's very solid financial position.
-The syndicate was formed in November 2010 amongst selected commercial banks of Deutsche Post.
-The commissioned banking consortium includes Citibank, Commerzbank, Deutsche Bank and HSBC.
-With the five-year syndicated loan Deutsche Post has made use of the current favorable market conditions and agreed upon a long-term secure and financially attractive liquidity reserve.
-At the same time by further optimizing its financing structure the company has implemented an important component of its new financial strategy, presented in spring.
-Frankfurt Bureau, Dow Jones Newswires; 49-69-29725-500

entity.property: Billion Credit Line Deutsche Post AG

description.hltext_display: 戶籍法將修正 查證親等更便利(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者周永捷台北2010年12月22日電）立法院內政委員會今天初審通過戶籍法修正草案，過去民眾辦理器官移植或繼承登記時，須備妥親等關聯資料。修正草案規定，內政部可以透過電腦系統，提供親等資料，手續更便民。過去民眾要辦理人工生殖、器官捐贈、繼承登記時，必須由申請戶籍謄本後，再依各主管機關需求，填報相關文件，辦理的手續非常繁雜。除此之外，目前戶政事務所受理民眾查詢親等關聯資料，是以戶為單位，查證時間冗長，也容易衍生疏漏。內政部民政司長謝愛齡今天在內政委員會答詢表示，人工生殖法規定受術夫妻不得為直系血親、直系姻親、4等親內的旁系血親，過去民眾要先申請所有4等親的戶籍謄本，再填妥其他所需文件才能完成辦理。謝愛齡說，戶籍法修正草案秉持便民理念，未來戶政司可以運用現行戶籍資料，透過電腦資訊系統連結親屬關係，直接提供人民親等關聯資料。

description.hltext_display: Eriksson notches 100th goal as Dallas defeats Montreal
description.content:
Loui Eriksson scored his 100th career goal, Stephane Robidas recorded three assists and the Dallas Stars posted a 5-2 victory over the Montreal Canadiens at American Airlines Center.
Brad Richards, Jamie Benn, Adam Burish and Karlis Skrastins also found the back of the net for Dallas, which improved to 11-2-2 in its last 15 games and surged to the top of the Western Conference standings.
Kari Lehtonen made 27 saves in the win.
Brian Gionta and Mathieu Darche scored for the Canadiens, who have dropped two in a row to begin their season-high seven-game road trip. Montreal has lost five of six overall.
Carey Price stopped just 12 shots in defeat.
Burish lit the lamp seven minutes into the contest and Benn beat Price on a short-handed breakaway to make it 2-0 with 6:01 remaining in the first period.
The Stars led 3-0 after Skrastins dug the puck out from under the Montreal goaltender and fired it home at the 2:31 mark of the middle stanza.
Darche put the visitors on the board at 10:43 of the second period before Richards restored Dallas' three-goal cushion on a deflected shot with three minutes left in the frame and Montreal defenseman P.K. Subban serving an interference penalty.
Gionta scored a short-handed goal at 12:15 of the third period, but Eriksson responded 53 seconds later on a deflection of a Mike Ribeiro pass.
Game Notes
The Stars are 10-0-2 over their last 12 home games...Dallas has scored a power-play goal in six straight games...Montreal's Jacques Martin coached his 1,214th career game to gain sole possession of eighth place in league history.

description.hltext_display: 현대그룹 1.2조 실체 ‘브릿지론’..
description.content:
[경제투데이 민동훈 기자] 현대그룹의 현대건설 인수자금 실체가 서서히 드러나고 있다.
22일 금융권과 현대그룹 등에 따르면, 현대그룹이 프랑스 나티시스은행으로부터 대출받은 1조2000억원은 브릿지 론(Bridge loan)인 것으로 밝혔졌다. 현대그룹은 그간 제출을 거부했던 대출계약서도 향후 소송과정에서 공개할 의사가 있음을 시사했다.
하종선 현대그룹 전략기획본부 사장은 이날 서울중앙지법에서 현대건설 매각과 관련해 열린 ‘양해각서(MOU) 해지 금지 가처분 신청’ 첫 심리 직후 기자들과 만나 이같이 밝혔다.
하 사장은 “나티시스은행에서 빌린 1조2000억원은 브릿지론과 유사한 대출”이라며 “대형 글로벌 인수합병(M&A)의 경우에 일단 브릿지론을 얻은 후 재무적 투자자(FI)나 전략적 투자자(SI)와 협의가 완결되면 대출 대신 투자의 형태로 대체하는 것이 널리 행해지는 방법”이라고 말했다.
브릿지론은 충분한 자금을 모을 때까지 시일이 걸릴 경우 단기차입 등에 의해 필요자금을 일시적으로 조달하는 대출이다.
하 사장은 나티시스 은행 대출 경위와 관련해 “애초 넥스젠이 투자에 참여하려다가 입찰규정상 다른 컨소시엄 멤버가 인수대금을 못 낼 경우에 대한 연대책임 문제로 넥스젠 투자위원회가 투자를 잠정 보류하게 됐다”며 “이때 넥스젠이 자신의 100% 모회사인 나티시스에 상황을 잘 설명해 대출이 이루어지게 된 것”이라고 설명했다.
하 사장은 “한 두 달이면 대금을 완납하는 스케줄인데 그걸 못 기다리고 채권단이 MOU를 해지했다. 이행보증금 등 안전장치들이 많은데도 불구하고 채권단이 한 두 달을 못기다리고 MOU를 해지한 것은 참으로 부당하다”고 주장했다.
현대그룹은 또 논란이 됐던 프랑스 나티시스 은행의 대출계약서를 법원에 제출할 수도 있다는 뜻을 밝혔다. 이에 따라 현대건설 매각 과정에서 각종 추측이 나돌았던 대출계약서 원본 내용이 어떤 형태로든 공개될 가능성이 높은 것으로 관측된다.
이날 현대그룹의 가처분 신청 심의를 맡은 서울중앙지법 민사합의50부(최성준 수석부장판사)는 현대그룹에 “정확한 결정을 위해서는 현대건설 자본을 나티시스 은행에 담보나 보증으로 걸어둔 것은 아닌지, 순수한 신용대출인지를 확인해야 한다”며 현대그룹에 대출확인서 원본을 제출해 줄 것을 요청했다.
이에 대해 현대그룹측은 “프랑스 금융법상 문제가 있어 가처분 결정 이전에는 재판부에만 공개하도록 하겠다”고 조건부 수용 의사를 내비쳤다. 또 “본안 소송이 진행되는 시점쯤에는 나티시스 은행을 설득해 (채권단 등에) 공개하는 방향을 검토하고 있다”고 덧붙였다.
앞서 현대그룹은 그동안 현대상선 프랑스법인의 나티시스은행으로부터 대출받았다는 1조2000억원의 성격을 놓고 의혹을 받아왔으며, 채권단이 요구한 대출계약서 제출을 끝내 거부한 바 있다.
이에 채권단은 현대그룹과 맺은 MOU 해지와 더불어 주식매매계약(SPA) 체결도 거부하면서 현대그룹의 현대건설 인수 우선협상대상자 지위를 박탈했다.
민동훈 기자 mdh5246@
[관련기사] ☞ 현대건설 채권단, 현대그룹 우선협상자 지위 박탈(상보) ☞ 현대그룹, "수조원 유상증자"… 시간벌기용(?) ☞ 현대차그룹, 현대건설 예비협상 지위 이어받나? ☞ 현대그룹, 현대상선 프랑스법인 수조원 유상증자 추진

description.hltext_display: Adidas to grow faster than Nike: report
description.content:
German sporting goods company Adidas (XETRA:ADSGN.DE - News) will grow faster than U.S. archrival Nike (NYSE:NKE - News) in 2015, Adidas Chief Executive Herbert Hainer told German daily Boersen-Zeitung.
He said it was important for the company to aim for sustainable and continuous growth rather than the highest turnover for 2015.
"That's why our Route 2015 plan stipulates that we want to achieve an average annual earnings growth rate of 15 percent," he said in the paper published on Wednesday.
"That's considerably higher than the planned annual sales growth of 8 percent," he added.
"As a result of our programmes and opportunities we think we will grow faster than our competitors," Hainer told the paper.
Rival Nike, the world's largest athletic shoe and clothing maker, on Tuesday said it saw future orders (excluding currency exchange rates) -- a key measure of sales growth -- rising 11 percent year-on-year for December 2010 through April 2011, which was lower than many analysts' expectations.
Nike's Chief Financial Officer, Don Blair, said 2011 gross margins would be at least 50 basis points below 2010.
(Reporting by Michelle Martin)

event_or_fact.property: That's considerably higher than the planned annual sales growth of 8 percent
As a result of our programmes and opportunities we think we will grow faster than our competitors
That's why our Route 2015 plan stipulates that we want to achieve an average annual earnings growth rate of 15 percent

Morning Report
The pair touched the descending channel's resistance level once again, where it is attempting to start an expected bearish intraday direction highlighted in our reports yesterday. Stochastic is moving to the downside, while RSI is in overbought areas; therefore reinforcing today's expectations of a downtrend. Essential factors needed to resume this scenario are represented in a clear breach and base built below levels 1.0140 - 1.0115, alongside stability below 1.0195.
The trading range for today is among the key support at 0.9925 and the key resistance at 1.0285.
The short term trend is to the upside as far as 0.9925 remains intact with targets at 1.1485.
Previous Report
Weekly Report

description.hltext_display: 高市債臺高築 每人負債5萬(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者王淑芬高雄2010年12月22日電）高雄縣市12 月25日合併，合併後的高市府非自償債務約新台幣1410 億元，平均每名市民負債5萬900元；不過，合併後的高雄市總資產含土地、建物設備等有1兆816億元。高市府現任財政局長雷仲達不諱言財政問題，他說，高雄市依法舉債，舉債制度高雄縣、市不同。他說，市府正在執行「十年財政收支平衡計畫」，從民國94年開始降低歲出、入短差數額。經過多年管控，他盼民國103年財政收支平衡，屆時高雄市就有更多的償債能力。高市府統計，截至民國97年11月底，高雄市1年以上非自償債務累積未償餘額共有1268億7000萬元、高雄縣是142億2000萬元。平均每個高雄縣民負債約1萬7000元、高雄市人均負債約9萬元；縣市合併後人均負債是5萬900元。資料顯示，高雄市97年度歲出預算數是712億7000萬元、高雄縣是399億8000萬元。歲入方面，中央統籌分配款是縣市政府重要的財源之一；高雄市去年獲得132億元、高雄縣69億元；中央專案補助方面，高雄市獲得100億元、高雄縣0元，不過在一般性補助款方面，高雄市得到9億元、高雄縣有93億元挹注。總計民國98年，高雄市獲得中央補助款共241億元、高雄縣共162億元。

description.hltext_display: Coen brothers have a blast with 'True Grit'
description.content:
Home» Arts/Entertainment » Movies »
Jeff Bridges gives an Oscar-worthy performance as Rooster Cogburn, hired by Hailee Steinfeld's character to hunt down a murderer.
( PARAMOUNT PICTURES )
Zoom | Photo Reprints
CONTRA COSTA TIMES
The pioneering Coen brothers don’t blaze new territory with True Grit.
And that's just fine, pardners, because these highfalutin' boys sure know how to wrastle up one spitfire of a Western.
For their latest dip into genre filmmaking, the influential duo behind No Country for Old Men and Fargo put their unique stamp on a praised novel and a movie classic.
Grit delivers all the things we've come to expect from a Coen brothers film: a whip-smart screenplay, colorful characters, and sequences that are stunningly acted and shot. That it doesn't aspire to be anything more than a frothy bit of entertainment might disappoint some. To them I say: Just get off your high horse and have a little fun.
The top-notch cast includes three great actors -- Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, and Josh Brolin -- who thoroughly deliver on their potential. But it's the relatively unknown Hailee Steinfeld -- only 13 during filming -- who accomplishes the most remarkable feat, sitting as tall in the saddle as the veterans.
Unlike the 1969 film version that landed John Wayne an Oscar for playing gruff lawman Rooster Cogburn, this Grit stays relatively true to the 1968 novel by Charles Portis. The more literal adaptation might put off fans of the Duke, but Steinfeld plays the Mattie Ross part so well, others will be happy she's so much in the spotlight.
After all, Grit is her story, and it begins with a much older Mattie as narrator, recounting her arrival in Fort Smith, Ark., and meeting Cogburn (Bridges). The precocious 14-year-old hires the boozy, trigger-happy U.S. Marshall to hunt down her daddy's killer, Tom Chaney (Brolin).
TRUE GRIT
Written and directed by Ethan Coen and Joel Coen. A Paramount Pictures release, opening Wednesday at Rave Franklin Park, Fallen Timbers, and Levis Commons. Rated PG-13 for some intense sequences of Western violence including disturbing images. Running time: 110 minutes.
Critic's rating: * * * * 1/2
Rooster Cogburn.............. Jeff Bridges
Mattie Ross..................Hailee Steinfeld
LaBoeuf............................ Matt Damon
Tom Chaney........................Josh Brolin
Initially, the foul-tempered, hung-over Cogburn dismisses Mattie as an annoyance who's wearing britches that are way too big. That impression erodes over time as he realizes this kid with a wicked tongue and the resolve of an army general displays the same "true grit" many ascribe to him.
Cogburn eventually agrees to Mattie's offer, but he ditches her. Furious she's been left behind, Mattie catches up with him and Texas Ranger LaBoeuf (Damon), who is after Chaney for murdering a senator. LaBoeuf and Mattie met in Fort Smith and immediately started sparring.
The unlikely trio -- a bible-quoting girl, a drunken burnout, and a dandy with polished spurs -- embark on a risky adventure into "Indian" territory where they learn Chaney has taken up with a gang.
Along the way, Grit relies on all the genre cliches: shootouts, galloping horses, nasty snakes, and stunning Western landscapes. Director of photography Roger Deakins, a frequent Coens collaborator, re-creates the sweeping rough and rugged 1870s terrain by focusing the lens on parts of Arkansas, New Mexico, and West Texas.
But while Deakins authentically evokes the setting, it's the performances and writing that breathe life into Grit.
Fresh off his win for Crazy Heart, Bridges delivers another Oscar-worthy performance. The actor, who played The Dude in the Coens' loopy The Big Lebowski, makes Cogburn a hilarious and foul-tempered eccentric with questionable hygiene. He hams it up wonderfully, giving his lawman a guttural voice that sounds like it's soaked way too long at the bottom of a whiskey bottle.
Damon, in a less showy role, does a terrific deadpan as the rather inept, self-absorbed Ranger. Meanwhile, Brolin attempts something different with what could have been a one-note villain, and succeeds even though he's given little screen time.
But the real star is Steinfeld, who holds her own in each of the numerous bantering exchanges with Bridges and Damon. She shines the brightest in the film's best scene, shrewdly haggling with a trader (Dakin Matthews) over ponies.
It does benefit the young actress that the Coens' dialogue pirouettes with such a folksy yet graceful cadence. The screenplay is rife with quote-worthy gems, like this snappy retort from LaBeouf to Mattie: "You give out very little sugar with your pronouncements." Go ahead and try that one out over Christmas dinner.
All these factors contribute to one entertaining and sassy holiday treat. Grit might not be the same daring caliber of Western as Clint Eastwood's Unforgiven, but, man, can its impressive cast shoot off the killer one-liners.
Permanent Link http://www.toledoblade.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20101222/ART09/12210349/-1/RSS05 STORY:201012210349

description.hltext_display: Video - Boys Basketball: Valders at Roncalli 12/21/10
陳雲林話別 願盡力協商投保(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者郭玫蘭台北2010年12月22日電）大陸海峽兩岸關係協會會長陳雲林今天在話別時表示，兩會商談還有很多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。陳雲林說，這次商談簽署了兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議，並為另一個重要協議（兩岸投資保障協議）進行階段性總結，達成共識，雙方將盡最大努力，在不久的將來完成協商。財團法人海峽交流基金會原訂上午11時50分在台北圓山飯店舉行話別談話會，但因班機時間延後，因此談話會延至12時30分舉行。海基會董事長江丙坤表示，這次兩會簽署的「海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，是從人道關懷出發，以兩岸人民的健康福祉為依歸。他說，今年透過兩岸交流，有超過600萬人次往來兩岸從事觀光、商務等活動，透過疫病的通報、緊急救護制度的建立，對兩岸人民的生命安全提供進一步保障。同時，也有機會透過兩岸合作，優勢互補，在醫藥衛生方面發展新商機，共創雙贏。江丙坤表示，明年在兩會繼續推動協商交流下，繼續完成未完的許多協議，也將推動兩岸民間交流，希望透過這些交流和協商，讓兩岸民眾共享成果。他說，海基會將在兩會建構的平台上，繼續推動平等協商，循序漸進，擱置爭議、追求雙贏。陳雲林表示，第6次兩會商談，我們是帶著希望和期待而來，帶著成果而歸，為能夠讓兩岸和平發展寫下新的歷史而感到高興，為讓兩岸民眾身體健康、生命安全做出努力，感到無限欣慰。他說，兩會商談未來還有許多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙只能夠阻止進程的時間，永遠改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。陳雲林對圓山飯店的熱情接待，以及負責維安的員警表達感激之意。他說，這次到台北的情況與上次有很大不同，員警的敬業精神，給他留下深刻的印象。陳雲林表示，兩會簽署的15項協議和達成兩項共識，得到相當多台灣人民的理解和支持。未來將不辜負兩岸人民期待，繼續為兩岸人民謀福祉。海基會副董事長高孔廉、副秘書長馬紹章，大陸海協會常務副會長鄭立中、執行副會長兼秘書長李亞飛、駐會副會長李炳才、副秘書長張勝林等出席談話會。陳雲林離開飯店前，現場響起陣陣掌聲，飯店人員熱情歡送，高喊「再見！歡迎再來！」。

description.hltext_display: '트레이드 SOS' 中企 수출..
description.content:
올 8,600곳 3만여건 상담… 컨설팅 받은 업체 수출 늘어
한국무역협회가 중소기업의 수출지원을 위해 지난 2월 설립한 종합무역컨설팅지원단 '트레이드 SOS'가 국내 중소 무역인들의 수출 도우미로 성공적으로 자리매김하고 있다.22일 무역협회에 따르면 올 2월 '트레이드 SOS' 출범 이후 지난 11월까지 상담건수를 집계한 결과 8,600개의 중소기업이 총 3만5,728건의 컨설팅 서비스를 이용한 것으로 나타났다. 하루 평균 42개 기업이 174건의 상담을 받은 셈이다.
컨설팅 유형별로는 각 지역마다 배정된 컨설턴트가 직접 현장을 찾아가 상담을 해주는 현장컨설팅(1만5,283건)이 전체의 43%를 차지하며 가장 큰 인기를 끌었다. 또 영어ㆍ중국어ㆍ일본어 등 18개국 언어로 수출입 거래를 돕는 외국지원컨설팅(1만2,768건), 자유무역협정(FTA) 원산지증명과 국제특허ㆍ해외인증, 세무ㆍ회계 등 전문 분야에 대한 무역전문컨설팅(7,677건)이 그 뒤를 이었다.
특히 올해 서비스를 이용한 기업 8,600곳의 수출실적을 보면 '트레이드 SOS'의 효과는 더욱 빛난다. 지난해까지만 해도 수출실적이 전혀 없던 기업의 수가 6,087곳이었지만 올 1~10월에는 5,893곳으로 줄어들었다. 이에 따라 수출실적 1,000~100만달러의 기업은 지난해 1,843개에서 올해 1,989개로 늘었고 같은 기간 100만달러 이상의 수출실적을 거둔 기업도 670곳에서 718곳으로 48개사나 증가했다.이는 '트레이드 SOS'가 수출의지는 있지만 방법을 몰라 고민하던 수출 초보 기업들에 대한 컨설팅 서비스가 실제 수출성과로 이어지고 있다는 증거라는 점에서 눈길을 끌고 있다. 더욱이 아직 집계되지 않은 11~12월 실적을 더할 경우 수출실적 증가업체 수는 지난해보다 더욱 늘어날 것으로 무역협회 측은 예상하고 있다.
컨설팅 서비스를 받은 기업들의 만족도 역시 높은 편이다. 수출 초보 기업에 필요한 1대1 밀착지원으로 수출에 대한 자신감을 불어넣어줌으로써 중소기업의 수출 자생력을 기르는 데 큰 도움이 되고 있는 것으로 전해졌다. 일본 도시바, 미국 GE와 거래를 하는 한국차폐기술㈜의 관계자는 "트레이드 SOS의 도움으로 거래처와의 의사소통이 원활해진 덕분에 현지 바이어의 만족도가 크게 높아지며 메일 회신율도 두 배 이상 늘었다"고 말했다.이재형 무역협회 고객서비스본부장은 "내년 미국ㆍ유럽연합(EU)과의 FTA가 본격 발효되면 중소 수출업체들은 FTA를 활용하는 데 필수적인 원산지 관련서류 작성 등에서 많은 어려움을 겪게 될 것"이라며 "이에 따라 내년에는 중소기업들의 FTA 활용도를 극대화하기 위해 FTA 전문 컨설팅을 더욱 강화할 계획"이라고 말했다.한편 무역협회는 '트레이드 SOS'가 진행한 총 70건의 생생한 컨설팅 사례가 담긴 수출현장지원 성공사례를 책으로 발간해 지방 중소기업들에 무료로 배포하기로 했다.
김현상기자 kim0123@sed.co.kr
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: 中菲貿易前10月成長逾4成(中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者林行健馬尼拉22日專電）在中國與東南亞國家協會（ASEAN）自由貿易協定（FTA）上路之後，中國與菲律賓的經貿關係更加密切。今年前10個月，雙邊貿易總額達到227億美元，成長40.2%。
中國駐菲國大使劉建超今天在記者會上說，中國與東協FTA於1月正式啟動，雙邊將近有9成的7000項貨物享受零關稅待遇，同時服務業貿易協定與投資協定也陸續跟進。
根據中國大使館的資料，今年前10個月，中國對菲出口總額是94億美元，成長40%；中國自菲進口總額為133億美元，成長40.4%，菲國享有貿易順差。
中國現為菲國的第3大貿易夥伴。
在投資方面，今年前9個月中國對菲國投資為7300萬美元，較去年同期成長316%，成長幅度居東協地區第2高。菲國對中國投資達6300萬美元，成長177%。
劉建超表示，中國明年將啟動社會經濟方案，加強內需、投資與出口，這可為包括菲律賓在內的鄰國提供合作機會，特別是在農業、採礦業、發電業和環保等方面。

description.hltext_display: 현대제철 "새해에도 환경사랑..
description.content:
현대제철은 22일 서울 양재동 서울사무소에서 '어린이 환경작품 공모전' 시상식을 열고 수상자에게 상패와 상장ㆍ도서상품권 등을 전달했다. 박승하(가운데) 현대제철 부회장과 어린이 환경교실 참가 어린이들이 시상식 이후 새해에도 환경 사랑에 앞장설 것을 다짐하고 있다.
사진제공=현대제철

description.hltext_display: 獲利佳 遠銀連2年調薪(中央商情網)
description.content:
討論 (+)
調整字級：
(中央社記者田裕斌台北2010年12月22日電)遠東商銀(2845)今、明2年獲利穩健成長，總經理洪信德表示，今年元月全行都加薪，平均調幅超過5%，明年在獲利成長2位數下，7月有機會再加薪。
法人預估，遠銀今年每股稅後純益 (EPS)有1.2元，明年更可成長至1.5元，洪信德表示，由於去年已經轉虧為盈，擺脫金融海嘯陰霾，因此將年度加薪時間從7月提早至元月。
洪信德表示，目前遠銀的資產報酬率 (ROA)0.6%及股東權益報酬率 (ROE)11%都還有努力空間，年底前資產品質希望能達到呆帳率0.5%以下、覆蓋率200%的目標。
此外，由於遠銀今年持續獲利表現，股東明年也有股利可拿，洪信德說，因商業銀行多項業務可承作規模需以淨值為基準，因此去年起即確立股票股利為主的政策，去年每股配發0.45元股利中，有0.35元股票股利，外界推測，明年每股可望發1元股利，其中也將以股票股利為主。
遠銀董事會通過，將發行5年期、額度2億美元海外可轉債 (ECB)，遠銀表示，除了可藉此取得低利美元外，也可讓資產規模穩定擴大，為未來巴賽爾資本協定做準備，洪信德說，未來每年自然股本擴張的幅度希望都有10%水準。

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer räumt Defizite bei der Bahn ein
description.content:
Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer (CSU) hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. "Wir haben mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrühren", sagte der CSU- Politiker am Mittwoch im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden.
"Es macht sich jetzt bemerkbar, dass man geglaubt hat, man könne sich das eine oder andere an der Reserve sparen." Diese baue man zurzeit in allen Bereichen der Bahn wieder auf. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. "Aber die Öffentlichkeit kann erwarten, dass die Politik zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht werden - und das tun wir."
Ramsauer wies Vorwürfe zurück, dass die Winterreifenpflicht den Lastwagenverkehr nicht ausreichend einschließe. Natürlich müssten nicht nur die Antriebsachsen, sondern alle Achsen eines Lastwagens mit griffigen Allwetter- und Ganzjahresreifen ausgestattet sein. "Jeder Lastwagen, der auf den anderen Achsen nicht hinreichend bereift ist, wird sofort aus dem Verkehr gezogen", sagte der Verkehrsminister./wn/DP/tw
AXC0057 2010-12-22/09:39

description.hltext_display: Kings halt Colorado's win streak at six games
description.content:
Jonathan Quick stopped all 23 shots he faced for his third shutout of the season, as the Los Angeles Kings blanked the Colorado Avalanche, 5-0, at Pepsi Center.
Dustin Brown recorded two goals and two assists for the Kings, who finished their five-game road trip with a 3-2-0 mark and will host Edmonton on Thursday. Brad Richardson, Rob Scuderi and Justin Williams also scored in the victory.
"Overall, this road trip was a tough one, but (winning) three out of five games is not bad," said Brown. "This is one of the best defensive games we've played in some time."
Craig Anderson allowed all five goals on 32 shots for Colorado, which was shut out for the first time this season and in the process saw its six-game win streak halted.
The Kings opened the scoring at 12:26 of the first period on Scuderi's first goal of the season. He maneuvered his way into the lower right circle and sent a backhander through traffic and past Anderson.
At the 6:31 mark of the second stanza, the visitors moved ahead by two on Richardson's fifth goal. Drew Doughty held control at the centerpoint and faked a shot to move around a Colorado defender, then skated toward the outer rim of the right circle. Doughty fired a centering pass, which was redirected into the net by Richardson from the top of the crease.
Less than eight minutes into the final frame, the Kings made it 3-0. Anze Kopitar drove to the net from the right wing and his stuffer from in close was saved, but the rebound sat loose in the crease and Brown was there to punch it home over the sprawled-out Anderson at 7:27.
"They create all their chances from playing good defensive hockey," said Anderson about the Sharks. "They control the puck from their defensive zone, and they created good opportunities all game."
Brown struck again with 4:57 to play in regulation with a wrister from the slot before Williams capped the scoring at 17:49 on the power play with a laser one-timer from the left circle.
Game Notes
The St. Louis Blues are now the only team in the NHL this season that has not been shut out...Despite the loss, the Avs are 7-1-1 in their last nine home games. Prior to this setback, Colorado's last regulation loss at home was on November 9 against Calgary...This was Quick's 11th career shutout...Four of Richardson's five goals this season have been scored against the Avs...The Kings were 1-for-3 on the power play. The Avs had three chances with the extra skater.

description.hltext_display: Cielos nubosos y lluvias débiles en general en Canarias
description.content:
Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, 22 dic (EFE).- Los cielos en Canarias presentarán hoy nubes en general, con lluvias en general débiles, tendiendo a poco nuboso por la tarde, en las islas orientales, y más abundantes por la tarde, en las occidentales, según la predicción de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología.
El viento soplará del oeste de moderado a fuerte, más intenso en La Palma y El Hierro, especialmente de madrugada, en tanto que las temperaturas oscilarán entre los 13 grados de El Hierro y los 23 de Lanzarote, Fuerteventura, Gran Canaria, Tenerife y La Palma.
En el mar habrá, en la provincia occidental, soplará vientos del noroeste de fuerza 5 -escala Beaufort-, que disminuirá gradualmente hasta norte al final del día -3 a 4-; mientras que en la oriental será del oeste de fuerza 4 a 5, con áreas de 3 a 4, en el canal Jandia-Isleta.
Fuerte marejada disminuyendo gradualmente a marejadilla en las islas occidentales y fuerte marejada en las orientales, salvo en el sur de Gran Canaria y este de Lanzarote y Fuerteventura, donde predominará la marejadilla.
El mar de fondo del oeste-noroeste tendrá olas de 2 a 3 metros, aumentando hasta los 4 metros del altura.
En los próximos días habrá intervalos nubosos, con las temperaturas en ligero descenso y vientos de componente norte flojo a moderado.
La predicción por islas para hoy es la siguiente: PROVINCIA DE LAS PALMAS LANZAROTE Nuboso con lluvias en general débiles, tendiendo a poco nuboso por la tarde: Temperaturas en ligero descenso, siendo moderado en el interior. Viento del oeste moderado a fuerte, girando a noroeste; disminuyendo al final a moderado.
TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMA Y MÁXIMA PREVISTAS: ARRECIFE 18 23 FUERTEVENTURA Nuboso con lluvias en general débiles, tendiendo a poco nuboso por la tarde: Temperaturas en ligero descenso, siendo moderado en el interior. Viento del oeste moderado a fuerte, girando a noroeste; disminuyendo al final a moderado.
TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMA Y MÁXIMA PREVISTAS: PUERTO DEL ROSARIO 18 23 GRAN CANARIA En el norte nuboso a muy nuboso con lluvias en general débiles; en el sur, intervalos nubosos. Temperaturas en ligero descenso en costa, siendo moderado en medianías y zonas altas. Viento del oeste moderado, con intervalos de fuerte en el sur y zonas altas; girando a noroeste moderado con rachas de fuerte en cumbres y nordeste.
TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMA Y MÁXIMA PREVISTAS: LAS PALMAS DE GRAN CANARIA 20 23 PROVINCIA DE SANTA CRUZ DE TENERIFE TENERIFE En el norte nuboso a muy nuboso con lluvias en general débiles, en el resto, intervalos nubosos. Temperaturas en ligero descenso en costas y moderado en medianías y zonas altas. Viento del oeste moderado a fuerte en cumbres centrales durante la madrugada; girando a noroeste moderado con intervalos de fuerte en cumbres centrales y nordeste de la isla.
TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMA Y MÁXIMA PREVISTAS: SANTA CRUZ DE TENERIFE 18 23 LA GOMERA Nuboso a muy nuboso con lluvias en general débiles, más abundantes por la tarde y en el norte. Temperaturas en ligero descenso en costas y moderado en medianías y zonas altas. Viento del oeste moderado, girando pronto a noroeste moderado.
TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMA Y MÁXIMA PREVISTAS: SAN SEBASTIÁN DE LA GOMERA 18 22 LA PALMA Nuboso a muy nuboso con lluvias en general débiles más abundantes en el oeste durante la madrugada y en el norte por la tarde.
Temperaturas en ligero descenso en costas y moderado en medianías y zonas altas. Viento del noroeste moderado a fuerte durante la madrugada, girando y disminuyendo gradualmente hasta norte flojo a moderado al final del día.
TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMA Y MÁXIMA PREVISTAS: SANTA CRUZ DE LA PALMA 19 23 EL HIERRO Nuboso a muy nuboso con lluvias en general débiles más abundantes en el norte por la tarde. Temperaturas en ligero descenso en costas y moderado en medianías y zonas altas. Viento del noroeste moderado a fuerte durante la madrugada, girando y disminuyendo gradualmente hasta norte flojo a moderado al final del día.
TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMA Y MÁXIMA PREVISTAS: VALVERDE 13 18 EFE

description.hltext_display: 삼천리ENG 대표 강병일씨 삼천리ES..
description.content:
삼천리그룹은 22일 강병일 부사장을 ㈜삼천리 ENG 대표이사로, 현치웅 부사장을 ㈜삼천리ES 대표이사로 선임했다고 밝혔다. 삼천리그룹은 또 물 사업을 강화하기 위한 환경사업본부와 신규 사업 개발과 자원사업을 전담할 사업개발본부를 신설하는 것을 골자로 한 조직개편도 단행했다.

description.hltext_display: Dos jóvenes detenidos por el hurto de teléfonos móviles y otros objetos
description.content:
Zaragoza, 22 dic (EFE).- Dos jóvenes de 26 y 23 años han sido detenidos en Zaragoza como supuestos autores del hurto de teléfonos móviles y otros objetos.
C. C. S., de 26 años, y edad, y N. D. D., de 23 años, fueron detenidos a las 18.40 horas de ayer en la Avenida de San José y fueron puestos a disposición judicial acusados del hurto de un teléfono móvil.
A los dos jóvenes les fueron intervenidos otros cuatro teléfonos móviles, un reloj y otros objetos que llevaban ocultos. EFE

description.hltext_display: Kuwaiti investments in Jordan stand at $9 billion
description.content: Chief Executive Officer of the Jordan Investment Board Nasser Sunnaa said that Kuwaiti investments in the Kingdom jumped to $9 billion over the last few years.

description.hltext_display: Verbessertes ACS-Angebot: Nur wenige Hochtief-Aktionäre greifen zu
description.content:
Die Offerte ist inzwischen zwar deutlich besser, aber dennoch hat ACS schlechte Karten: Der spanische Infrastrukturkonzern ACS kommt auch mit seinem verbesserten Übernahmeangebot bei den Aktionären von Hochtief nur langsam voran.
Nur wenige Hochtief-Eigner ändern etwas an ihrem "nein". Quelle: dapd
HB DÜSSELDORF. Bis zum Dienstagabend sei das Tauschangebot für 5825 Hochtief-Aktien angenommen worden, teilte ACS am Mittwoch im Internet mit. Der Anteil der Stimmrechte an Hochtief liege damit bei 27,26 Prozent.
Damit würde ACS auch inklusive der vom Finanzinvestor Southeastern Asset Management in Ausssicht gestellten „ungefähr“ zwei Millionen Aktien noch unter der Schwelle von 30 Prozent liegen. „Unser Angebot und unsere Strategie bleiben unverändert“, sagte eine ACS-Sprecherin in Deutschland.

description.hltext_display: "삼성 물류까지"…물류업계 초비상
description.content:
안철우, 이재영[이투데이 안철우, 이재영 기자]삼성그룹이 삼성SDS를 중심으로 물류사업을 확대할 움직임에 물류업계가 초비상 상태다. 삼성전자의 해외 수출 물량이 100조원을 넘어섰고, 그동안 세계 각지의 원자재 조달과 제품 수송을 현지 업체에 위탁하는 방식을 활용해 왔다는 점에서 삼성이 물류사업에 본격 참여할 경우 메가톤급 파장을 예고한다.
22일 관련업계에 따르면 최근 삼성SDS는 정관 변경을 통해 신사업에 물류를 추가하는 등 물류사업 진출이 카운트다운에 들어갔다.
삼성그룹이 확정한 핵심성장 동력중에 하나인 삼성SDS의 물류사업은 삼성전자 물류 사업을 기반으로 대외 물류 시장을 적극 공략, 글로벌 물류 회사로 거듭난다는 것이 골자다.
이를 위해 지난 10일 설립 이래 최대 규모로 진행된 임원승진 인사에서도 물류전문가 출신을 경영진에 전진 배치했다. 물류사업을 총괄하고 있는 김형태 글로벌LPO(Logistics Process Outsourcing)사업부장(전무)을 부사장으로 승진시킨 것을 놓고 그동안 소문만 무성했던 물류사업 진출을 위한 본격 신호탄으로 받아들여지고 있다.
◇ SDS-로지텍 합병하나= 관련업계도 삼성의 물류체계에 큰 변화가 있을 것으로 내다보고 있다. 삼성SDS는 올 초부터 대한항공과 범한판토스 등 항공 및 해외물류 전문가들을 대거 영입했다.
특히 지난 6월 범LG계열의 물류회사인 범한판토스와 삼성SDS가 인력 스카우트를 놓고 법적 공방을 벌이는 등 업계에서는 삼성SDS의 물류업 진출을 둘러싸고 이미 신경전이 시작됐다.
현장에서는 삼성SDS의 중견 물류컨설팅업체의 인수설, 삼성전자로지텍과의 합병설 등이 끊이지 않고 있다. 삼성그룹 내에는 전자 계열사에 대한 물류를 취급하는 자회사 성격인 삼성전자로지텍이라는 물류회사가 있지만 정작 이 회사가 삼성전자 물류에서 차지하는 비중이 20%에도 못미치기 때문이다. 취급 물량 대부분이 수출품인 까닭이다.
삼성SDS와 로지텍이 합병을 할 경우 물류 사업도 확대, 사업규모도 커지면서 외부 물류협력사와의 계약을 통해 물량을 운송하던데서 벗어나 삼성 계열 전체 물량을 취급하게 될 전망이다. 삼성의 전체 물량을 책임질 경우 연매출은 수조원에 달할 것으로 예상되는 만큼 삼성SDS의 삼성전자로지텍 인수 계획은 크게 부각되고 있다.
◇ 대한통운 인수 하나= 물류업계는 삼성이 물류 사업 확장을 위해 대한통운을 인수할 경우를 가장 우려하고 있다.
신임 고순동 SDS 사장은 M&A를 성장의 도구로 적극 활용하겠다고 밝히는 등 신사업 추진에 대한 강한 의지를 보이고 있다.
삼성SDS가 로지텍와 합병후 본격적인 물류 사업에 진출했을 경우 기존 삼성이 일부 물류협력사와의 계약을 통한 물류 만을 회수, 업무를 승계할 뿐이지만 대한통운을 인수할 경우 그 의미는 크게 달라진다.
대한통운을 인수한다면 삼성SDS는 삼성그룹의 2자 물류 뿐만 아니라 3자 물류로의 진출 및 향후 전문물류업체로서 전
문성을 갖출 수 있기 때문이다.
그동안 대기업의 물류자회사 확대와 관련, 여전히 단순 수송과 보관 등만을 제공할 뿐 대외적인 전문 물류서비스를 의뢰받아 처리하기에 전문성이 부족이 늘 문제로 지적돼 왔다.
그러나 삼성SDS가 대한통운 인수에 성공할 경우 그동안 전문 물류업체로서 80년을 지켜온 대한통운의 물류 운송 경험을 토대로 사업확장과 전문성이라는 두마리 토끼를 잡는 셈이다.
업계관계자는 “대한통운 인수는 각 그룹들에게 물류 네트워크 확장과 전문성을 모두 갖추게 할 것”이라며 “특히 삼성SDS의 경우 물류 사업에 적극적으로 뛰어든다면 기존 그룹 내 물량 뿐 아니라 3자 물류 등에도 영향력을 가져 물류 업계 전체가 긴장할 수 밖에 없을 것”이라고 말했다. 미래경제를 선도하는 바른뉴스 이투데이 | 행복한 부자 풍요로운 인생 Hello! moneyCopyrightⓒ이투데이, All rights reserved. (무단 전재 및 재배포 금지)

description.hltext_display: ETFs To Watch December 22, 2010 (TNA, XBI, EET, FXF)
description.author: ETF Professor
description.content:
Play resurgent materials names with the Market Vectors Coal ETF (NYSE: KOL), the Global X Copper Miners ETF (NYSE: COPX) and the SPDR S&P Metals & Mining ETF (NYSE: XME). Leveraged plays of the day: Direxion Daily Financial Bull 3X Shares (NYSE: FAS) and the Direxion Daily Small Cap Bull 3X Shares (NYSE: TNA).
The SPDR S&P Biotech ETF (NYSE: XBI) got a nice boost on Tuesday.
Emerging markets plays of the day: Market Vectors Russia ETF (NYSE: RSX), SPDR S&P BRIC 40 (NYSE: BIK) and the ProShares Ultra MSCI Emerging Markets (NYSE: EET).
Forex play of the day: CurrencyShares Swiss Franc Trust (NYSE: FXF).

description.hltext_display: اتحاد الصحفيين العرب يطالب القادة بتصفية الخلافات وإعادة التضامن
description.content:
مسقط - الرأي - طالبت الامانة العامة والمكتب الدائم لاتحاد الصحفيين العرب .. الملوك والرؤساء العرب مجددا ببذل كل الجهود لتصفية الخلافات العربية العربية وتحقيق وحدة الصف الفلسطيني ، وإعادة لُحمة التضامن للأمة العربية كي تتمكن من مواجهة التحديات التي تواجهها .
واعرب الاتحاد في ختام اجتماع امانته العامة ومكتبه الدائم في العاصمة العمانية مسقط عن امله في موقف عربي موحد يعيد للأمة ثقتها بنفسها ويمكنها من النهوض بأعبائها ، مطالبا الصحفيين في كل بلد عربي العمل على رأب الصدع العربي وتجنب توسيع الخلافات العربية العربية كي تتمكن الأمة من مواجهة أخطار الفتن الطائفية والعرقية والمذهبية والدينية التي تكاد تعصف بوحدة أقطار عديدة في عالمنا العربي .
واستنكر اتحاد الصحفيين العرب في بيانه الذي وافق عليه الأعضاء في جلستهم الختامية , بشدة الحملة اللاأخلاقية التي قامت بها العديد من وسائل الإعلام الاسبانية ، سواء العمومية أو الخاصة ضد المغرب، والتي لجأت الى تزييف الحقائق فيما يتعلق بأحداث الشغب التي عرفتها مدينة العيون ، بالصحراء يوم 8 تشرين الثاني 2010 ، حيث نشرت صورا مزيفة ومعطيات كاذبة حول ما حصل خلال تفكيك المخيم الاحتجاجي ، الذي نصب لتحقيق مطالب اجتماعية ، وإدعت أن السلطة المغربية نفذت عمليات إبادة تطهير عرقي .
وقرر المكتب الدائم لاتحاد الصحفيين العرب مناقشة هذا الموضوع ، في اجتماع خاص في القاهرة ، من منطلق احترام قواعد الصحافة الأخلاقية ، وحق الرأي العام ، بصفة عامة ، والمواطن الاسباني بصفة خاصة ، في العمل المهني الذي يجب أن يتوفر على معايير المصداقية والجودة , مؤكدا التزامه بمبدأ حرية العمل الصحفي وحق كل الصحفيين في التنقل بهدف القيام بواجبهم المهني .
وجدد الاتحاد دعمه للصحفيين الفلسطينيين وتضامنه معهم في وجه الانتهاكات التي يتعرضون لها من جانب سلطات الاحتلال وتهدد حياتهم وأمنهم وسلامتهم وحقهم في العمل والسفر ، كما يدعو الاتحاد الى وقف كل أشكال الانتهاكات والتجاوزات التي يتعرض لها الصحفيون من قبل اى جهة فلسطينية ، ومنها استمرار إغلاق المؤسسات الإعلامية ومنع توزيع الصحف والاعتقال على خلفية الرأى والعمل الصحفي في كل الأراضي الفلسطينية المحتلة .
كما اكد مساندته لصمود الصحفيين العراقيين الذين يدفعون كل يوم المزيد من دمائهم الزكية دفاعا عن وحدة العراق ضد محاولات إثارة الفتن الطائفية ويصرون على خروج القوات الأجنبية من ارض العراق الشقيق . وحيا أرواح الشهداء الصحفيين الذين استشهدوا ليصل عدد الشهداء الى 361 شهيدا على رأسهم النقيب السابق المرحوم الأستاذ شهاب التميمي ، مؤكدا وقوفه بكل قوة الى جوار نقابة الصحفيين العراقيين التي تدافع بضراوة عن وحدة واستقلال العراق.
وتضامنا مع نقابة الصحفيين العراقيين قرر الاتحاد عقد اجتماعه القادم في بغداد في ( نيسان ) 2011 وعزمه على أن يجعل من اجتماعه في بغداد تظاهرة إعلامية عربية واسعة يحيي صمود الصحفيين العراقيين ونقابتهم .
وتحقيقا لما طلبه رئيس الاتحاد من ضرورة مراجعة أساليب عمل الاتحاد بما يمكنه من توسيع دوره المهني، عهد المؤتمر الى الوفد اللبناني بإعداد ورقة عمل تنطوي على خطة شاملة بحيث يصبح قضية الارتقاء بالمهنة ضمن أولويات اتحاد الصحفيين العرب لتدبير التمويل اللازم لتنفيذ الخطة الطموحة من خلال خطة مالية جديدة ، تتوزع أعباؤها على النقابات الوطنية ، وتسهم فيها الدول العربية ، وإعادة تشكيل وتوسيع لجنة تنمية الموارد المالية وتكليفها بتلقي الاقتراحات من المنظمات والنقابات الوطنية المتعلقة بالدعم المالي .
وفى مجال الحريات الصحفية ناقش المكتب الدائم بعمق واهتمام كبيرين تقرير الحريات الصحفية المقدم من لجنة الحريات في الاتحاد وأكد الأهمية الفائقة لايلاء مسألة الحريات الصحفية ما تستحقه من الاهتمام ، وأكد المكتب الدائم ضرورة ممارسة النقابات الوطنية الاهتمام الأكثر في مسألة الحريات .
وقد انعقد اجتماع الامانة العامة والمكتب الدائم للاتحاد بدعوة من جمعية الصحفيين العمانية ، في مدينة مسقط في الفترة ما بين 19 – 20 كانون اول 2010 ، وحضر جلسة افتتاح المؤتمر الذي عقد تحت رعاية يوسف بن علوي بن عبد الله الوزير المسؤول عن الشؤون الخارجية ، عبد العزيز بن محمد الرواس مستشار سلطان عمان للشؤون الثقافية وحمد بن محمد الراشدي وزير الإعلام وعدد كبير من كبار المسؤولين العمانيين.
وفي أعقاب جلسة الافتتاح عقدت الامانة العامة اجتماعا حضره كل أعضاء الامانة العامة ، برئاسة رئيس الاتحاد الأستاذ إبراهيم نافع ونواب الرئيس الأساتذة: الياس مراد ( سورية) عاشور التليسي (ليبيا) ، احمد بهبهاني( الكويت )عبد الله البقالى ( المغرب ) .
كما حضره الأمين العام مكرم محمد احمد والأمناء المساعدون : عبد الوهاب الزغيلات نقيب الصحفيين الأردنيين وحاتم زكريا( مصر) ونعيم الطوباسى(فلسطين) ، ومحيي الدين تيتاوي ( السودان) ، والهاشمي نويرة(تونس)، وعبد الله الجحلان ( السعودية )، وأم كلثوم محمد (موريتانيا) ، وسالم الجهوري ( سلطنة عمان).

description.hltext_display: Cowboys put Romo on season-ending IR
description.author: JAIME ARON
description.content:
IRVING -- With time running out on this season, the Dallas Cowboys told injured quarterback Tony Romo he might as well rest up for next season.
Romo went on injured reserve Tuesday, eliminating any chance of him playing Saturday night at Arizona or in the season finale at Philadelphia. He's been out since breaking his left collarbone Oct. 25.
"When you just start doing the math on it and say, 'Where is he with this injury? Where is he physically functioning? Where is he being able to take a hit? And then, how much practice time you need to have any player be ready to play in a game?'" interim head coach Jason Garrett said. "We just felt when we factored all those things together, it just made sense to make this move."
It seemed silly for the Cowboys to take any chances since they can't make the playoffs and are guaranteed a losing record, though they kept the option open by carrying him on the active roster the last eight weeks. Garrett said having this weekend as a target for a return helped Romo with his recovery.
On Sunday, team owner Jerry Jones said Romo was "still having sensitivity there" and not ready to play. Garrett indicated Romo would try to practice Tuesday, but the move was announced before the club even hit the field.
Jon Kitna will start the final two games. Garrett said he wouldn't use second-year backup Stephen McGee unless Kitna is hurt.
Kitna is 4-4 since taking over for Romo, including 4-2 since Garrett replaced fired coach Wade Phillips. Record aside, Kitna's statistics are quite similar to Romo's this season.
"Our team has certainly responded to him," Garrett said. "He's a very driven guy. He loves to play football. He's very competitive. He'll look at the positive things and build on them and try to correct some of the things he doesn't like. It's an ongoing process. He embraces it every day."
There's no threat of a QB controversy because Kitna will be 39 next season and Romo remains the face of the franchise. Kitna knows the drill.
"I signed a contract to be the backup to Tony and that's my job," he said. "I'm supposed to play as well as I can if I get a chance to play. We've been consistent the last six weeks. That's what you want."
Kitna didn't take a single snap last season and lost all four games he started for Detroit the previous season. So while this has been hailed as a career revival, Kitna doesn't see it that way.
"Honestly, it's not that satisfying for me because I knew that this was who I was," he said. "What's exciting to me is that I got to be in a place that the guys around me make my job very easy."
Romo completed 69 percent of his passes (148 of 213) for 1,605 yards with 11 touchdowns. His quarterback rating of 94.9 was a shade below his career average. His seven interceptions in six games was a big step back after having nine in a full season last year.
"I think if you look at the body of work, him individually and how our offense functioned, there were a lot of good things but there were obviously some areas to improve upon," Garrett said.
Romo has spent every game on the sideline, wearing a headset and consulting with Kitna. He'll continue doing that.
"He's played in this offense more than anybody has, so he has a real understanding of what we're trying to get accomplished," Garrett said. "He and Jon have a really great relationship. There are some productive things that go on during the game and Tony is a big part of that."
The Cowboys promoted Teddy Williams from the practice squad to take Romo's place.
Williams hasn't played organized football since he was a senior in high school. A gruesome ankle injury scared off recruiters, so he turned to track and became an All-America sprinter while at Texas-San Antonio. But he never gave up on playing football and signed with the Cowboys during training camp in San Antonio.
He played cornerback from the summer until last week, when he was switched to receiver because of a series of injuries. While he's a long way from learning his new duties, his speed could make him a threat as a returner. Garrett said it remains to be determined whether Williams will be active against the Cardinals.
"My whole thing is that I just want to be on the field and play," Williams said.

description.hltext_display: Laos pondrá en marcha su bolsa con dos empresas públicas el 11 de enero
description.content:
Bangkok, 22 dic (EFE).- Laos, país comunista que se encuentra entre los más pobres de Asia, pondrá en marcha su primer mercado de valores el próximo 11 de enero en el que, para comenzar, cotizarán dos empresas públicas, informa hoy la prensa local.
EDL-Generation of Laos, cuyo único negocio es la venta de electricidad al monopolio público Electricite du Laos, del cual es filial, ofrece desde hace una semana 217 millones de acciones a inversores locales e internacionales a 4,300 kip (0,54 dólares) por acción.
De estas, 10,8 millones se reservan a los empleados de la empresa que podrán adquirirlas a 4,000 kip la acción.
La otra empresa que cotizará en la bolsa laosiana es el Bank pour le Commerce Exterieur Lao (BECL) que pondrá a la venta a partir de mañana 20 millones de acciones a un precio inicial de 5,000 kip (0,63 dólares).
La comisión Laos Securities Exchange exige que ambas empresas hayan vendido el 80 por ciento de estas acciones antes de empezar con las negociaciones en el parqué, según explica el periódico Vientiane Times. EFE

description.hltext_display: Programa mundial de Alimentos compra 13.000 toneladas de trigo en Afganistán
description.content:
Kabul, 22 dic (EFE).- El Programa Mundial de Alimentos (PMA) de la ONU anunció hoy su mayor compra de trigo en Afganistán, un total de 13.000 toneladas, con vistas a aliviar una potencial escasez aguda de este cereal entre la población.
La cantidad serviría para alimentar a más de 500.000 personas durante tres meses, anunció en un comunicado el PMA, que precisó que ha comprado el trigo al Ministerio afgano de Agricultura con fondos proporcionados por la agencia estadounidense de desarrollo, USAID.
El PMA afirmó además que adquirirá cereal también directamente de manos de organizaciones campesinas y de los propios agricultores, con vistas a desarrollar los mercados agrícolas en el país, que vive golpeado por la guerra y es uno de los más pobres del mundo.
"Estamos entusiasmados y aliviados de que esas compras nos permitan seguir proporcionando ayuda a las familias más necesitadas de Afganistán", expresó en la nota de prensa el representante de la organización en el país, Louis Imbleau.
Según la organización, la adquisición permitirá una distribución más rápida del cereal, por lo que se reducirá el posible impacto de la escasez de trigo, que amenazó la ayuda invernal para un millón de afganos tras las inundaciones sufridas por el país vecino, Pakistán.
Las operaciones del PMA en Afganistán se vieron afectadas seriamente por las inundaciones paquistaníes, porque muchos de los suministros hacia tierras afganas quedaron bloqueados mientras eran transportados al país desde Pakistán.
El Programa Mundial de Alimentos pretende además comprar 24.000 toneladas de trigo a Pakistán con ayuda de otros donantes, como Japón, aunque la organización recordó que sufre una importante escasez de fondos.
Se requiere una donación total de 132 millones de dólares hasta finales de julio de 2011 para mantener las operaciones, estimó el PMA, que se ha fijado como objetivo proporcionar alimentación a 7,3 millones de afganos el año que viene. EFE

description.hltext_display: Glühbirnen - Führende EU- Parlamentarier wollen Verbot kippen
description.content: Berlin – Führende Abgeordnete des EU-Parlaments wollen das Verbot von herkömmlichen Glühbirnen in Europa zu Fall bringen. „Ich werde alles tun, um das Glühbirnenverbot in der EU doch noch zu kippen", sagte der Vorsitzende des Industrie-Ausschusses, Herbert Reul (CDU), der Zeitung „Die Welt" (Mittwochsausgabe). Er forderte die EU-Kommission auf, das Glühbirnenverbot „unverzüglich" außer Kraft zu setzen. Brüssel müsse überprüfen, ob die als Alternative zur Glühbirne vorgesehene Energiesparlampe aufgrund der nachgewiesenen Gesundheitsgefahren überhaupt noch vertrieben werden dürfe. Das deutsche Umweltbundesamt hatte Anfang Dezember vor Gefahren durch das in Energiesparlampen verwendete Quecksilber gewarnt. Die Produktsicherheit und die Gesundheit der Konsumenten müssten oberste Priorität haben, forderte Reul. Der Ausschussvorsitzende warf der Brüsseler Gesetzesbehörde vor, dass sie mit dem Glühbirnenverbot „getrieben vom Klimaschutzwahn Symbolpolitik betrieben hat, die weder dem Klimaschutz noch der Gesundheit der Menschen dient". Auch die Vizepräsidentin des Europäischen Parlaments, Silvana Koch-Mehrin (FDP), forderte eine Aussetzung des Glühbirnenverbots. Solange nach wissenschaftlichen Erkenntnissen davon auszugehen sei, dass Energiesparlampen zu erheblichen Gesundheitsschäden führen könnten, müsse die EU das Glühbirnenverbot zumindest für Privathaushalte aussetzen, sagte sie der „Welt". „Es kann doch nicht sein, dass unter dem Deckmantel des Umweltschutzes die beim Verbraucher beliebten und bewährten Glühbirnen vom Markt genommen und durch gesundheitsgefährdende Produkte ersetzt werden", sagte sie dem Blatt. Durch das „unsinnige Glühbirnenverbot" werde „Sondermüll als Lichtquelle" vorgeschrieben. Hintergrund der Kritik sind die Untersuchungsergebnisse des Umweltbundesamtes (UBA). Demnach können Energiesparlampen ein ernsthaftes Gesundheitsrisiko darstellen. Geht eine Energiesparlampe zu Bruch, so kann laut Erkenntnissen der Experten eine Quecksilberkonzentration im Raum freigesetzt werden, die den Richtwert von 0,35 Mikrogramm pro Kubikmeter um das Zwanzigfache überschreitet. Darum sollten sich insbesondere Kinder und Schwangere von Energiesparlampen fernhalten, empfiehlt die Bundesbehörde. Herkömmliche Glühbirnen mit 100 und 75 Watt dürfen in der EU nicht mehr verkauft werden, da sie als Energiefresser gelten. Ab September kommenden Jahres dürfen auch die am meisten verbreiteten 60-Watt-Birnen nicht mehr neu in Verkehr gebracht werden. (APA/AFP)

description.hltext_display: Oregon's Kelly named coach of the year
description.content:
Oregon head coach Chip Kelly has been named the 2010 Walter Camp coach of the year, honoring the college football coach of the year as voted by coaches and sports information directors.
Kelly has taken home the honor in just his second season as the Ducks coach after guiding the team to a 12-0 mark, a No.2 ranking in the polls, and a spot in the national championship game against top-ranked Auburn on January 10.
Kelly took 24 of the 55 votes to beat out Auburn coach Gene Chizik, who took 17 votes.
The Ducks led the nation with 49.3 points per game and ranked second in total offense at 537.5 yards per game. On the defensive side of the ball, the team is giving up just 18.4 points per game, 14th lowest in the nation.
Kelly is the first Oregon coach and third from the Pac-10 to win the award, which has been handed out annually since 1967.
Jim Harbaugh of Stanford finished third with five votes, while Gary Patterson of TCU, the winner of the award last year, and Mark Dantonio from Michigan State each had three votes.

description.hltext_display: Dallas Stars beat Canadiens
description.content:
DALLAS -- Jamie Benn scored a short-handed goal, and Brad Richards added a power-play tally as the surging Dallas Stars beat the Montreal Canadiens 5-2 on Tuesday night.
Adam Burish, Karlis Skrastins and Loui Eriksson added goals for the Stars, 10-0-2 in their last 12 at home. Stephane Robidas had three assists, and Kari Lehtonen made 27 saves to help Dallas improve to 11-2-2 in its last 15.
Carey Price, starting for the 10th time in 11 games, allowed all five goals on 17 shots for Montreal.
Brian Gionta scored short-handed and Mathieu Darche added an even-strength goal for the Canadiens, 1-5 in their last six. Montreal played the second game of a seven-game trip.
Burish's deflection off Steve Ott's pass gave the Stars the lead at 6:59 of the first period. Burish batted at the puck with his stick, about waist high, and the goal stood up after a video review.
Benn broke through two defenders and backhanded a shot through Price's pads to make it 2-0 at 13:59 of the first period. Montreal had gone on the power play 16 seconds earlier.
Skrastins stretched the advantage to 3-0 at 2:31 of the second when he buried a rebound past Price.
Darche scored when the puck glanced off his skate and past Lehtonen, making it 3-1 at 10:43 of the second.
But Richards' shot from the left point went in off Montreal defenseman Josh Gorges at 17:00 of the second period to restore Dallas' three-goal lead.
Gionta's goal from the left circle at 12:15 of the third drew the Canadiens within 4-2, but Eriksson answered with a redirected 53 seconds later.
NOTES -- It was the only meeting this season between the teams. ... Darche's goal also withstood a video review, when it was determined he didn't kick the puck into the net. ... The Stars hadn't beaten the Canadiens since Dec. 23, 2007. ... Benn has two of Dallas' four short-handed goals. ... Skrastins scored his second goal of the season and 31st of his career in his 792nd game. ... Dallas scored on four of its first 12 shots. ... The Stars have won 13 straight and are 16-2 when they score first. ... Dallas has scored a power-play goal in six straight games.

description.hltext_display: Kansas State's Pullen, Kelly suspended by NCAA
description.content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. -- Preseason All-America guard Jacob Pullen, who had made 82 consecutive starts for No. 11 Kansas State, was suspended by the NCAA for three games just before the Wildcats' game against UNLV on Tuesday night.
In a statement, the school said Pullen and senior forward Curtis Kelly were being punished for receiving impermissible benefits in connection with the purchase of clothing at a local department store.
It said the length of Kelly's suspension had not been determined by the NCAA's student-athlete reinstatement staff.
Pullen and Kelly, the two top scorers for Kansas State, which went into the UNLV game 10-2. Their loss is certain to significantly weaken the Wildcats. Pullen, a four-year starting guard, will also miss games against Missouri-Kansas City and North Florida.
"These young men have worked hard to represent themselves and Kansas State in a positive manner," coach Frank Martin said in a statement. "Having said that, they made a mistake in judgment and have to pay a price for that."
Pullen is the Wildcats' team leader and preseason choice as Big 12 player of the year. He's averaging 16.5 points and 3.8 assists and is the first Kansas State player selected to the preseason All-America team. He had played in 115 games and is a three-time team captain.
Kelly is averaging 10.3 points and four rebounds.

event_or_fact.property: These young men have worked hard to represent themselves and Kansas State in a positive manner; Having said that, they made a mistake in judgment and have to pay a price for that.

description.hltext_display: 若者に魅力ある産業に/宮崎建協「地域建設産業の方向性研究会」
description.content:
宮崎県建設業協会（永野征四郎会長）は20日、「地域建設産業の方向性についての研究会」の初会合を開いた＝写真。産学官が共同で建設業界が抱えるさまざまな課題を議論し、解決に向けた具体的な方向性を探るもので、委員長には中澤隆雄宮崎大工学部教授が就任した。会合は3回程……
記事の詳細は「建設通信新聞」でお読みください。

description.hltext_display: مقتل 700 جندي أطلسي في أفغانستان العام الحالي
description.content:
كابول - ا ف ب - تخطت حصيلة قتلى القوات الدولية الذين سقطوا في اطار العمليات العسكرية في افغانستان هذا العام عتبة ال700 قتيل، ليصبح العام الاكثر دموية الى حد كبير منذ 2001، ما يشير الى تكثيف نزاع يتراجع التأييد الشعبي له باضطراد في الدول المساهمة في التحالف.
فقد قتل 701 جندي ، اي بمعدل جنديين تقريبا كل يوم، منذ الاول من كانون الثاني في صفوف القوات الدولية بقيادة الولايات المتحدة في افغانستان كما ذكر موقع آيكاجولتيز الالكتروني المستقل امس .
وهذه الحصيلة الاجمالية تفوق بنحو الثلث حصيلة العام 2009 الذي كان مع سقوط 521 قتيلا الاكثر دموية بالنسبة للقوات الاميركية والاطلسية في البلاد حيث تواجه منذ ثلاث سنوات تصعيدا للتمرد الذي تقوده حركة طالبان.
ومعظم القتلى هم من الجنود الاميركيين الذين يمثلون ثلثي الجنود الاجانب ال140 الفا المنتشرين في هذا البلد.
وبحسب الموقع المتخصص في احصاء ضحايا قوات التحالف في العراق وافغانستان فان الجيش الاميركي خسر 493 جنديا في افغانستان في 2010، و1440 منذ بداية الحرب اواخر العام 2001، موضحا ايضا ان اكثر من 9200 جندي اميركي اصيبوا بجروح منذ تسع سنوات.
وفي الاجمال اسفر النزاع حتى الان عن سقوط 2271 جنديا من التحالف بحسب الموقع الذي لا يوضح العدد الاجمالي للجرحى في صفوف قوة الحلف الاطلسي (ايساف).
وخسر الجيش البريطاني الذي ينشر 9500 عنصر في افغانستان، 101 من جنوده في 2010 و346 منذ بدء النزاع.
اما فرنسا التي تنشر 3850 جنديا على الارض حاليا فخسرت 52 منهم منذ 2001. وقد قتل الاخيران في عمليتين لا تفصل بينهما سوى بضع ساعات يومي الجمعة والسبت.
والخسائر البشرية في صفوف القوات الاميركية والقوة الدولية للمساعدة على ارساء الامن في افغانستان (ايساف) التابعة لحلف شمال الاطلسي تسير في منحى تصاعدي شبه ثابت منذ بدء النزاع: 60 قتيلا في 2004، 131 في 2005، 191 في 2006، 232 في 2007، 295 في 2008 قبل ان تتسارع بشكل ملفت لتصل الى 521 في 2009.
ووتيرة الخسائر في الوقت الحالي في افغانستان شبيهة باسوأ اشهر الحرب في العراق، بين نيسان وحزيران 2007. وفي تلك الاونة ارسلت الولايات المتحدة تعزيزات الى العراق ووضعت استراتيجية لمحاربة التمرد على غرار تلك التي قررها الرئيس الاميركي باراك اوباما في نهاية 2009 مع ارسال 30 الف جندي اضافي الى افغانستان.
لكن الضحية الاولى للنزاع تبقى المدنيين الذين قتل الاف منهم، اما بسبب ضربات جوية للحلف الاطلسي او في معظم الحالات، بحسب الامم المتحدة، بسبب قنابل يدوية الصنع او هجمات انتحارية يشنها المتمردون على القوات الاجنبية او قوات الامن الافغانية.
وعدد القتلى في صفوف المدنيين يتزايد باضطراد. وبحسب الامم المتحدة قتل اكثر من 1200 خلال الاشهر الستة الاولى من العام 2010، اي 25% اكثر من النصف الاول من العام 2009، كما سقط 1997 جريحا اصابات معظمهم خطيرة.
ويبدو ان التأييد الشعبي للنزاع وكلفته البشرية في تدهور مستمر أكان في الولايات المتحدة او في اوروبا، المساهمتين الرئيسيتين في قوة التحالف الدولية في افغانستان.
ويعتبر حوالى 60% من الاميركيين ان هذه الحرب لا تستحق العناء بحسب استطلاع للرأي نشرت نتائجه في منتصف كانون الاول. وفي موازاة ذلك تريد غالبية عظمى من الاوروبيين سحب قواتها او على الاقل خفض عديدها.
وتؤكد واشنطن التي تشير الى تحقيق «تقدم» في مواجهة المتمردين في الاشهر الاخيرة، انها تنوي البدء بسحب قواتها من افغانستان في صيف 2011 فيما يعتزم الحلف الاطلسي نقل مسؤولية الامن في كامل ارجاء البلاد الى القوات الافغانية بحلول العام 2014.
من جهة اخرى ، اعلنت الحكومة الافغانية امس انها اغلقت 57 شركة امنية خاصة تعتبرها غير شرعية وهو اجراء اراده الرئيس الافغاني حميد قرضاي الذي يتهم هذه الشركات بالحصول على قسم كبير من المساعدة الدولية وزيادة الفساد.

description.hltext_display: PC메이저 ´델´의 반격…"스마트폰 시..
description.content:
[EBN산업뉴스 박영국 기자]세계 3대 PC 메이커 중 하나인 델(Dell)이 스마트폰 시장 진출을 선언했다.
22일 델의 한국법인 델인터내셔널은 서울 광화문 올레스퀘어에서 기자간담회를 열고 4.1인치 스마트폰 베뉴(Venue)와 5인치 태블릿폰 스트릭(Streak)을 공개하고 국내 스마트폰 시장 진출 계획을 밝혔다.휴대폰 메이커인 팬택이 "휴대성이 결여된 PC는 5년 안에 사라질 것"이라는 전망을 내놓은 지 단 하루 만이다.
제품 카테고리는 각각 ´스마트폰´과 ´태블릿폰´으로 구분했지만 스크린 사이즈만 좀 차이가 있을 뿐, 두 제품 모두 스마트폰이라고 봐도 무방하다.
특히, 스마트폰 베뉴(Venue)의 경우 세계 최초로 한국에서 출시된다.
델 본사에서 출시국 우선순위를 결정할 당시 한국 법인인 델인터내셔널 측이 ´하이엔드급 제품에 대한 호응도가 높은 국가´라는 점을 내세워 한국 시장에 우선 출시할 것을 요구했다는 후문이다.
´스마트폰+PC = 모바일컴퓨팅´ 패러다임 대응
이같은 델의 움직임은 스마트폰과 태블릿 등 모바일 기기들이 고성능화로 PC와의 경계가 허물어지면서 위기에 놓인 전통적인 PC 메이커로서의 생존 전략으로 분석된다.
임정아 델인터내셔널 컨슈머 사업부 본부장은 "전세계 IT업계는 ´모바일컴퓨팅´이라는 새로운 파도 앞에 직면해 있으며, 델은 이같은 패러다임 변화에 대응하기 위해 3년간의 치밀한 준비를 진행해 왔다"고 말했다.그는 이어, "우리는 그동안 컴퓨팅 사업을 통해 고객에 대한 높은 이해도와 뛰어난 기술력을 축적했으며, 우리에게 모빌리티란 그동안 개발해온 우수한 컴퓨터를 좀 더 작게 모바일트렌드에 맞춰 선보인다는 것을 의미한다"고 덧붙였다.4.1인치와 5인치라는 스크린 크기에서도 볼 수 있듯 스마트폰 중에서도 대형 사이즈가 델이 추구하는 방향이다.
크기가 작으면 휴대는 좋을지 몰라도 컴퓨팅 디바이스로는 한계가 있는 만큼 큰 스크린에 고사양을 갖추고 컴퓨팅 성능이 뛰어난 가진 모바일 기기에만 집중한다는 게 델의 전략이다.
애매한 카테고리, 익숙지 못한 시장 ´난관´
델이 PC 시장에서 높은 기술력과 브랜드파워를 갖춘 기업이라는 점은 분명하지만, 델로서는 다소 생소한, 그러면서도 그 분야에서 오랜 기간 사업을 진행해온 기업들간 경쟁이 치열한 스마트폰 시장에 뛰어들었다는 것은 상당한 모험이 아닐 수 없다.
일단 델은 ´휴대폰´ 시장과 ´모바일컴퓨팅´ 시장을 구분해야 한다는 입장이다.임정아 본부장은 "사업 전략을 구축 과정에서 레드오션인 모바일 중에서도 가장 힘든 휴대폰으로 갈 것인지에 대한 고민이 있었지만 그건 아니라는 결론을 내렸다"며, "컴퓨팅 디바이스를 만드는 기업이라는 기본에서 벗어나지는 않을 것"이라고 말했다.하지만 이미 스마트폰은 ´휴대폰´ 내의 한 카테고리에 속해 있다는 인식이 굳어져 있고, 스크린이 좀 크다고 해서 그 카테고리를 벗어날 수 있는 건 아니다.
이미 델의 베뉴보다 큰 4.3인치 스크린의 HTC 디자이어HD가 시장에 나와 있지만, 이 제품 역시 스마트폰에 속한다.
5인치 ´스트릭´의 사이즈는 다소 애매하다. 델은 스트릭에 대해 "전세계 어디에도 5인치라는 폼팩터(Form factor)는 없었다"라며 "스마트폰과 태블릿PC의 장점만을 채택한 황금비율"이라고 주장했다. 이 제품에 ´태블릿폰´이라는 명칭을 붙인 것도 이같은 상징성을 부여하기 위한 듯하다.
하지만 그동안 모바일 업계에는 5인치 사이즈가 없었을 뿐 아니라 ´태블릿폰´이라는 분류명도 없었다. 앞으로도 델 이외에는 공통적으로 사용되지 않을 가능성이 높다.
스마트폰과 태블릿PC의 관계만 해도 이미 소비자들은 혼란스럽다.
아이패드 출시 당시 스티브 잡스 애플 CEO는 "노트북과 스마트폰의 중간에 있는 제3의 카테고리를 여는 제품"이라고 정의한 바 있다. 노트북과 태블릿PC, 스마트폰의 3개 카테고리만 해도 지나치게 인접해 있어 다른 새로운 개념이 비집고 들어갈 틈이 없다.
5인치의 애매한 사이즈를 ´스마트폰과 태블릿PC의 장점만 가진 것´으로 해석할 수도 있겠지만, 역으로 스마트폰 치고는 너무 크고 태블릿PC 치고는 너무 작다는 평가가 나올 수도 있다.
뛰어난 컴퓨팅 성능?…스펙은 ´평범´
더 우려되는 건 델의 두 제품들이 독특한 스크린 사이즈와 디자인 외에는 딱히 차별화된 점을 내세우지 못하고 있다는 점이다.
PC 시장에서의 우위를 바탕으로 컴퓨팅 성능이 뛰어난 가진 모바일 기기에 집중하겠다지만 스펙이 그다지 뛰어나 보이지도 않는다.
스마트폰과 태블릿 계열에서 듀얼코어 CPU와 DDR2 D램이 차세대 ´하이엔드급 스펙´으로 부각되고 있는 마당에 베뉴와 스트릭은 여전히 싱글코어와 DDR D램을 사용하고 있다.
그나마 싱글코어도 한물 간 퀄컴의 8250프로세서다. 앞서 공개된 팬택 베가엑스나 HTC 디자이어HD의 경우 퀄컴의 2세대 8255프로세서를 채택하고 있다는 점을 감안하면, 최소한 기본 스펙은 기존 휴대폰 메이커들보다 못한 셈이다.
물론, 스마트폰의 우위를 결정하는 요인에는 스펙 외에도 단말기와 OS간 원활한 호환성, UI의 편의성 등 다양한 요인이 있겠지만, 경쟁이 치열한 스마트폰 시장에서 델이 기존 휴대폰 메이커들을 압도하기 위해서는 베뉴와 스트릭보다는 더 진화된 모델을 들고 나올 필요가 있다는 지적이다./박영국 기자
☞ 델, 태블릿폰 등 공개…국내 시장 진출 본격화
☞ 스마트폰 ´속도 전쟁´ 키워드…´듀얼코어·DDR2´

description.hltext_display: Long KO return helps Louisville beat Southern Miss
description.author: FRED GOODALL
description.content:
ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. -- Justin Burke threw for a pair touchdowns, and Jeremy Wright scored on a 95-yard kickoff return Tuesday night to help Louisville beat former Conference USA rival Southern Mississippi 31-28 in the Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl.
Burke tossed scoring passes to 11 yards to Cameron Graham and 10 yards to Josh Chichester while the Cardinals (7-6) erased a 14-point first-half deficit, then produced a go-ahead field goal in the fourth quarter.
Austin Davis threw 205 yards and two touchdowns to become Southern Mississippi's career TD pass leader, moving ahead of Brett Favre and Lee Roberts in the Golden Eagles record book with 53 in three seasons.
The Southern Miss quarterback also scored on a 17-yard reception from receiver Quentin Pierce.
Wright's long kickoff return made it 28-all early in the fourth quarter. Chris Philpott's 36-yard field goal gave the Cardinals their first lead with 6:30 remaining.
Davis completed 19 of 32 passes, including TD throws of 32 yards to Pierce and 8 yards to Zeke Walters for the Golden Eagles (8-5).
In addition to becoming the Southern Miss career TD pass leader, the junior moved into second place on the school's career passing list with 7,396 yards -- 299 short of the 7,695 Favre threw for from 1987-90. Meanwhile, Desmond Johnson scored on a 62-yard run and finished with a season-high 107 yards rushing.
The win enabled Louisville to finish Charlie Strong's first season as a head coach with the Cardinals' first winning record since 2006.
Bilal Powell rushed for 75 yards for Louisville -- well below his season average of 120.9 -- however the 215-pound senior was instrumental in helping the Cardinals exhaust most of the clock after finally taking the lead.
Although they were meeting for the first time in a bowl game, there's a long history between the former conference rivals.
The Cardinals and Golden Eagles faced each other every season from 1978 to 1991 and both were members of C-USA 1996 to 2004, the season before Louisville moved to the Big East.
Southern Miss scored on its first two possessions, taking a quick 14-0 lead on Pierce's TD reception and Johnson's long run that left Louisville's defense, which ranked 11th nationally during the regular season, looking sluggish and bewildered.
The Cardinals didn't flinch, though, methodically climbing back into the game with help from linebacker Antwone Canady's fumble recovery, which set up Powell's 6-yard touchdown run and enabled Louisville to pull even at 21-all late in the first half.
Strong inherited a team that went 4-8 last season and was co-coach of the year in the Big East after the Cardinals' better-than-expected finish in the conference, achieved despite not having starting quarterback Adam Froman for the team's four games in November.
Burke completed 20 of 32 passes for 178 yards in his fifth consecutive start for the Cardinals, who went 3-2 in those games. He scrambled 19 yards on third-and-3 before throwing his TD pass to Graham to trim Louisville's deficit to 14-7 early in the second quarter.
Southern Miss answered with a seven-play, 64-yard march that Davis finished with his first his only reception of the season.
The redshirt junior quarterback from Meridian, Miss., circled to his right out of the backfield after handing off to receiver Kelvin Bolden, who handed to Pierce as he was heading around left end.
Davis became the Golden Eagles' career TD pass leader on the first play of the fourth quarter, finding Walters in the right corner of the end zone to snap a 21-21 tie. The lead lasted 15 seconds, as Wright took the kickoff on the left side of field and eventually made his way to the right sideline to finish the longest return in the short history of the Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl.

description.hltext_display: Louisville tops Southern Miss in Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl
description.content:
Chris Philpott kicked the go-ahead 36- yard field goal in the fourth quarter, and Louisville held on for a 31-28 victory over Southern Miss in the Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl.
Jeremy Wright returned a kickoff 95 yards for a touchdown earlier in the fourth to help the Cardinals (7-6) overcome a deficit and secure a winning season in head coach Charlie Strong's first year. Louisville also recorded its first postseason victory since the 2007 Orange Bowl.
Justin Burke threw for 178 yards and two touchdowns for the Cardinals, while Bilal Powell ran for 75 yards and a score.
"It was a total team effort," Louisville head coach Charlie Strong said. "That's what this team is all about."
Austin Davis passed for 205 yards and two scores for Southern Miss (8-5), which was making a ninth consecutive bowl appearance, but lost for the second straight year.
Southern Miss took a 28-21 lead on the opening play of the fourth quarter. The Golden Eagles had driven from midfield to the eight before Austin Davis completed a pass to tight end Zeke Walters on the right edge of the end zone.
But on the ensuing kickoff, Wright made his way through traffic to the left sideline, picked up one final block and sprinted into the end zone to even the game again.
Louisville forced a punt and took over deep in its own territory. Burke led the Cardinals into Southern Miss territory, but the drive stalled and Philpott kicked his field goal with 6:30 to play.
Cardinals linebacker Brandon Heath made a key third-down sack of Davis on the next Southern Miss possession, forcing a three-and-out. The failure to move the ball doomed the Golden Eagles, whose defense stopped Louisville too late. Southern Miss got the ball back with only seconds remaining and couldn't pull off a miracle play.
The Golden Eagles got out to a 14-0 lead on two first-quarter touchdowns. Quentin Pierce had a 32-yard TD reception about three minutes into the game, while Desmond Johnson scored on a 62-yard run with 10:12 left.
Louisville made up the deficit, though, by reaching the end zone three times in the second quarter.
Cameron Graham caught an 11-yard strike from Burke with 11:21 on the clock to get the Cardinals on the board. Southern Miss responded about two minutes later when Davis caught a 17-yard touchdown throw from Pierce, a wide receiver.
But Josh Chichester's 10-yard reception and Powell's six-yard run later in the half allowed Louisville to go into halftime tied, 21-21.
"I think we had chances to make more plays on offense," Davis said. "We missed on a couple plays that keep you up at night."
Game Notes
Johnson ran for 102 yards on 10 carries for Southern Miss...Louisville's Doug Beaumont led all receivers with seven catches for 57 yards...Southern Miss out-gained Louisville, 396-287, but averaged just 18.5 yards on four kickoff returns.

I think we had chances to make more plays on offense; We missed on a couple plays that keep you up at night.
That's what this team is all about.

description.hltext_display: Mavericks beat new-look Magic for Florida sweep
description.author: ANTONIO GONZALEZ
description.content:
ORLANDO, Fla. -- Caron Butler scored 20 points, and Dirk Nowitzki had 17 as the Dallas Mavericks became the latest team to topple the reconstructed Orlando Magic in a 105-99 victory Tuesday night.
Tyson Chandler added 16 points to help the Mavericks pull away in the fourth quarter for their 16th win in 17 games. A night after winning at Miami, they shot 50 percent from the floor, including 46 percent from 3-point range.
The Magic again looked like a team that hasn't had time to hold a practice since newcomers Gilbert Arenas, Jason Richardson and Hedo Turkoglu were acquired on Saturday. They've lost the first two games since the pair of blockbuster trades and dropped eight of their last nine.
The latest came on another monster night for Dwight Howard, who had 26 points and 23 rebounds but got no help from teammates. Howard has had at least 20 rebounds in three straight games.
This wasn't exactly the home debut Orlando was hoping for its newcomers.
The Magic orchestrated two trades that brought Arenas from Washington and Turkoglu, Richardson and Earl Clark from Phoenix. They gave up Rashard Lewis, Vince Carter, Mickael Pietrus and Marcin Gortat, plus a 2011 first-round draft pick, in the deals.
The problem now is sorting out how this revamped roster is supposed to work.
It wasn't until the Mavericks went ahead by 12 points in the fourth quarter that the Magic -- at least those other than Howard -- showed any consistent fight.
Richardson's 3-pointer with 56 seconds remaining trimmed the deficit to three. Then Jason Terry came back with a mid-range jumper from the wing, and Richardson followed with another from beyond the arc with 24 left to bring Orlando within two.
But the Mavericks would shoot free throws the rest of the way, and Orlando couldn't find any more Magic on this night. While the Magic sort out how their revamped roster is supposed to work, opponents have already exposed their biggest weakness.
Dallas coach Rick Carlisle activated four centers against the suddenly undersized Magic, who are without a true backup center with Gortat gone but are exploring options to receive another inside presence. The big lineup turned out to be a big plus.
The Mavericks went ahead by 12 points in the first quarter behind strong play from Nowitzki. The 7-foot sharpshooter benefited often when he was guarded by Turkoglu, usually a small forward, and other undersized opponents.
Orlando did show some zip with a a 17-2 run between the first and second quarters. The spurt was sparked by Arenas and Clark -- and, surprisingly, with Howard and Jameer Nelson on the bench -- and pushed the Magic ahead 31-29, with Howard leading a chest-bumping bonanza with every player during a timeout.
The celebration was premature.
The Mavericks regained control the rest of the way. Chandler had at least five dunks, almost all on wide open pick-and-rolls, and Dallas carved up Orlando's defense to again go up by 12 points and held on for the victory.
NOTES: Howard also had three straight 20-plus rebound games from Dec. 28-31 in 2007. ... Magic PF Malik Allen sat out the game with a sprained left ankle. ... The Mavericks don't play again until Monday at Oklahoma City.

description.hltext_display: Men's College Basketball Roundup
description.content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. -- Tre'Von Willis scored 16 points and Oscar Bellfield hit a key 3-pointer in the final 70 seconds, leading UNLV to a 63-59 victory Tuesday night over No. 11 Kansas State, whose two best players were suspended shortly before the game.
The NCAA, citing receipt of impermissible benefits, told point guard Jacob Pullen, a four-year starter and preseason All-American, to sit out three games. Curtis Kelly, the Wildcats' only other senior, was also told not to play and Kansas State said the extent of his punishment would be decided later.
The Wildcats (9-3) had trouble adjusting to the absence of their senior leaders and top two scorers and lost their second in a row.
Bellfield's 3-pointer gave the Runnin' Rebels (11-2) a 59-54 lead with 1:10 to go.
Martavious Irving's running layup sliced the lead to 59-56, but Willis had two foul shots and Bellfield hit one in the final seconds to seal the victory over the highest-ranked team the Rebels had played in the regular season in more than three years.
Nick Russell had 12 points for Kansas State. Rodney McGruder, who lost a tooth in the final minutes when he crashed to the floor after making a steal, had 11.
Pullen, who had started 82 games in a row, is the only preseason All-American Kansas State ever had. A four-year starter and three-time team captain, he leads the Wildcats in scoring with 16.5 per game and has climbed to No. 4 all time in school history with 1,688 points. In Kansas State's victory over the Rebels last year in Las Vegas, he scored 28 points.
The 6-9 Kelly, the only other senior on the squad, is averaging 10.3 points and four rebounds.
After Jamar Samuels' 8-footer gave the Wildcats their biggest lead at 40-34, Willis' bucket ignited a 14-2 spurt by the Rebels capped by Willis' getting wide open on a give-and-go and a layup by Quintrell Thomas that put UNLV on top 46-42. The Wildcats never led again.
After making a steal with about 4 minutes left, McGruder crashed face-first onto the court and knocked out a tooth. McGruder went to the bench and officials picked up the tooth before play resumed.
Bellfield's two free throws put UNLV on top 50-42 but McGruder's driving layup sliced the lead to 52-51. Anthony Marshall drove in for a bucket, got fouled by Russell, and made the free throw. Samuels' bucket with 2:29 to go brought Kansas State within two points at 56-54 before Bellfield's 3-pointer.
Marshall also had 11 points for the Rebels. Irving had 10 for Kansas State, which drew a loud, capacity crowd of 18,442 to Kansas City's Sprint Center.
Oklahoma State 79, Stanford 68: STILLWATER, Okla. -- Keiton Page made a key 3-pointer just before the halftime buzzer and then scored the rest of his 23 points in the second half to lead Oklahoma State past Stanford 79-68 Tuesday night for its seventh straight win.
After putting the Cowboys ahead just before halftime, Page hit two more 3s early in the second half as Oklahoma State outscored the Cardinal 20-7 to take control of the game.
Stanford (6-4) cut a 14-point deficit down to six in the final 2 minutes, but Page hit another 3-pointer and the Cowboys (11-1) were able to close it out from the free-throw line.
Josh Owens matched his career-best with 21 points to lead the Cardinal, Jeremy Green scored 17 and Aaron Bright added a career-high 12 points off the bench.
Oklahoma 66, Sacramento State 53: NORMAN, Okla. -- Calvin Newell came off the bench to score a career-high 17 points in only 17 minutes as Oklahoma remained unbeaten at home with a victory against Sacramento State.
Cade Davis scored 15 points and added a team-high three assists for the Sooners (6-6).
Sultan Toles-Bey scored a game-high 21 points for the Hornets (3-8) while Duro Bjegovic chipped in with nine.
Newell, who went 5 for 6 from 3-point range, hadn't scored in the last four games despite starting against Gardner-Webb and Oral Roberts in early December.
The Sooners' leading scorer Andrew Fitzgerald fouled out with 3:43 left. He scored eight points and pulled down five rebounds. Fitzgerald was averaging 16 points in Oklahoma's last five games.
With Fitzgerald in foul trouble, the Sooners outscored the Hornets in the paint 16-6 in the second half.
Oklahoma led by eight points at halftime and slowly increased its margin in the second half.
The Sooners held Sacramento State without a field goal for nearly a five minute stretch in the middle of the second half, during which Oklahoma went on a 10-3 run.
Newell scored five of Oklahoma's points as the Sooners took a 17-point lead.
Nebraska 79, Grambling State 39: LINCOLN, Neb. -- Ray Gallegos scored 15 points and Jorge Brian Diaz had 14 as Nebraska won its eighth straight game with a victory over Grambling State.
The Cornhuskers (10-2) dominated from the start, holding Grambling State (2-9) to one field goal in the first 8 1/2 minutes en route to an 18-3 lead. Nebraska took advantage of six Tigers turnovers during that stretch and scored a dozen fast-break points.
Nebraska had its way inside, scoring 42 points in the paint and outrebounding Grambling State 48-33. The Husker bench scored 47, led by Gallegos and Andre Almeida, who had nine points.
Peter Roberson had 12 points to lead Grambling State, which had its lowest point total of the year. Its previous low was 41 in a loss to Stephen F. Austin.
Iowa State 104, Chicago State 63: AMES, Iowa -- Melvin Ejim and Diante Garrett each scored 18 points and Iowa State closed the first half with a 24-0 run en route to a victory over Chicago State.
Jake Anderson added 17 points for the Cyclones (11-2), who made 11 of their first 13 shots and topped 100 points for the first time in five years.
Chicago State (3-11) hung with the Cyclones for the first 10 minutes and trailed just 35-26 after Carl Montgomery scored on a putback with 9:48 left in the half. But the Cougars didn't score again until the opening minute of the second half, going 21 straight possessions without points.
Iowa State, meanwhile scored on dunks, layups, a 3-pointer by Anderson and 14 free throws to sail into halftime with a 59-26 lead.
Montgomery led Chicago State with 25 points.
Houston 75, Sam Houston State 73: HOUSTON -- Kendrick Washington's layup with 12 seconds remaining gave Houston a 75-73 victory over Sam Houston State Tuesday night.
Neither team led by more than six points and the game was tied 14 times, the last with 41 seconds left when Gilberto Clavell made two free throws for Sam Houston State. But Washington scored his only points of the second half for the Cougars (7-5).
Sam Houston State (6-4) did not get another shot off.
Adam Brown had 21 points to lead Houston. Maurice McNeil scored 18, Darian Thibodeaux 12 and Washington finished with 10. Zamal Nixon had nine points and 11 assists for the Cougars, who shot 53 percent from the field.
Clavell led the Bearkats with 25 points. Josten Crow scored 20 points, 17 in the second half.
TCU 96, Northwestern State 79: FORT WORTH -- J.R. Cadot continued his hot shooting at home Tuesday night, hitting all six of his field goal attempts as TCU defeated Northwestern State.
Cadot, who was also 3 for 3 from the free-throw line and finished with 15 points, is now shooting 93 percent from the field (27 for 29) in the Horned Frogs' seven home games. He has made 21 straight shots on his home floor and is shooting 72 percent overall while averaging 8.2 points per game.
Ronnie Moss led TCU (8-4) with 22 points and five assists. He needs two more assists to become the 10th player in Horned Frogs history with 300 career assists.
Garlon Green added 21 points and Hank Thorns had 12 for TCU, which shot 57 percent from the field and outrebounded the Demons 41-22.
Will Pratt had 19 points and Louis Ellis 18 for Northwestern State (8-4), which had its five-game winning streak snapped. Shamir Davis added 15.
Rice 66, Stetson 63: LAS VEGAS -- Arsalan Kazemi scored 19 points and added 12 rebounds to lead Rice to a victory over Stetson at the Las Vegas Holiday Hoops Classic.
Rice (6-4) led by as many as 10 points in the second half before the Hatters (3-7) narrowed the Owls' lead to 63-61 on Tyshawn Patterson's 3-pointer with 34 seconds left.
Tamir Jackson then made three free throws over the final 32 seconds to help Rice secure the win.
Trey Stanton scored 11 points and Jackson had 10 for the Owls.
Corey Walden led Stetson with 15 points. Prairie View A&M 83, Dallas Christian 48: PRAIRIE VIEW -- Trant Sampson scored 24 points and Duwan Kornegay had 22 points and nine rebounds to lead Prairie View A&M past Dallas Christian.
The Panthers (3-10) never trailed, and scored 16 straight points to open a quick 18-2 lead. Sampson scored 14 of the 16 points in the run, including three 3-pointers. He finished the game 5 of 10 from behind the arc.
Prairie View led 40-18 at the half and by as many as 40 points in the second half against Dallas Christian, which plays in the National Christian College Athletic Association.
Michael Griffin scored 10 points for Prairie View, which was coming off a 90-51 loss to No. 12 Michigan State on Saturday.
Three players were in double figures for the Crusaders (2-17). Antoine Warren had 17 points, Isaac Gonzales 14 and Anthony Tubbs 10.
